What is the vision for multi-chain and dynamic merge mining on the Verus network?

The Verus network is working towards enabling multi-chain and dynamic merge mining capabilities, which will allow multiple Verus network blockchains to operate independently while still being merge mineable. This means that up to 20 Verus network blockchains can be mined simultaneously using a single hash, earning rewards and powering all chains at the same time. Each network blockchain will support fractional currency capabilities for both on-chain tokens and native zk-SNARK supporting currencies.
